metadata.title: CVE-2023-6110 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
deleting a non existing access rule deletes another existing access rulein its scope

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-openstackclient - 5.2.0-0ubuntu1.20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-openstackclient package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.0-0ubuntu1.20.04.2').
